pages.title: üõ†Ô∏è Jobs Overview
pages.description:
Jobs are the one of the main way to **earn gold and resources**. Each job costs **Energy**.

If you‚Äôre broke: do jobs.
If you‚Äôre rich: do jobs anyway (because capitalism).

fields.name: Core Commands
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ `!work <job>` - perform a job
‚Ä¢ `!check energy` - check your current energy

Examples:
`!work miner`
`!work digger`
`!work knight`

fields.name: Important
fields.value: Jobs **consume Energy** instantly. If you don‚Äôt have enough, Veyra will tell you you‚Äôre tired and you‚Äôll have to wait for energy regen.

pages.title: ‚ö° Energy System (How it works)
pages.description:
Energy is your daily stamina. Every job costs a chunk of Energy.

Think of Energy as your limited number of ""actions"". Use it smart.

fields.name: Max Energy
fields.value:
Your max Energy scales with level:

**Max Energy = 35 + (15 √ó Level)**

So higher level players can grind longer.

fields.name: Energy Regeneration
fields.value:
Energy regenerates automatically over time .

‚úÖ You gain **+1 Energy** per regen tick(6 min) until you hit your max.

fields.name: Energy Check
fields.value:
When you check energy, Veyra shows:
`current_energy / max_energy`

Example: `42/80`

pages.title: üõ°Ô∏è Knight
pages.description: Knight is a straightforward gold job. It‚Äôs consistent and simple.

fields.name: Energy Cost
fields.value: **80 Energy**

fields.name: Rewards
fields.value: Earn **40 to 90 gold** (random).

fields.name: When to use
fields.value: Use Knight when you just want raw gold without gambling for loot.

pages.title: ‚õèÔ∏è Digger
pages.description: Digger is a loot-focused job. You spend energy to dig and either get gold or loot boxes.

fields.name: Energy Cost
fields.value: **70 Energy**

fields.name: Possible Rewards
fields.value:
You get **one** of these rewards:

‚Ä¢ **20 gold**
‚Ä¢ **Wooden Box**
‚Ä¢ **Stone Box**
‚Ä¢ **Iron Box**
‚Ä¢ **Platinum Box**

fields.name: Drop Chances
fields.value:
Approximate chances:

‚Ä¢ **Wooden Box**: 35%
‚Ä¢ **Stone Box**: 25%
‚Ä¢ **Iron Box**: 10%
‚Ä¢ **Platinum Box**: 3%
‚Ä¢ **Gold (20)**: 27%

fields.name: Why it‚Äôs good
fields.value: If you like rolling for loot or want boxes for trading/collecting, Digger is your best friend.

pages.title: ‚õèÔ∏è Miner
pages.description: Miner is your resource grind job. It gives ores used for crafting systems and economy loops.

fields.name: Energy Cost
fields.value: **50 Energy**

fields.name: Possible Rewards
fields.value:
You get **one** of these:

‚Ä¢ **25 gold** (rare)
‚Ä¢ **Coal**
‚Ä¢ **Copper Ore**
‚Ä¢ **Iron Ore**
‚Ä¢ **Silver Ore**

fields.name: Ore Drop Chances
fields.value:
Approximate chances:

‚Ä¢ Copper Ore: 30%
‚Ä¢ Coal: 27%
‚Ä¢ Iron Ore: 21%
‚Ä¢ Silver Ore: 12%
‚Ä¢ Gold (25): 10%

fields.name: Ore Amount
fields.value:
Most of the time you get **3‚Äì6 ores**.

There is a rare bonus outcome where you get **12‚Äì20 ores** instead.

fields.name: Best use
fields.value: Do Miner if you want crafting materials or want to stockpile resources for later systems.

pages.title: üó°Ô∏è Thief
pages.description: Thief is PvP economy. You attempt to steal gold from another user. High risk, high annoyance.

fields.name: Energy Cost
fields.value: **60 Energy**

fields.name: Requirements
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Target must be a registered resident/player
‚Ä¢ You cannot rob yourself

fields.name: Success / Fail
fields.value:
Thief is a coin flip:

‚úÖ **Success:**
‚Ä¢ You steal **10% of target‚Äôs gold**, capped at **150**
‚Ä¢ Target pays an extra **fine** (1% of their gold, capped at 50)

‚ùå **Fail:**
‚Ä¢ You lose **30 gold** (ouch)

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt rob broke players (it just wastes energy)
‚Ä¢ Rob rich players, but expect revenge
‚Ä¢ If you can‚Äôt afford the 30 gold fail penalty, don‚Äôt gamble.

pages.title: üß≠ Explorer
pages.description: Explorer lets you roam around and discover a random item. It‚Äôs a loot job, not a gold job.

fields.name: Energy Cost
fields.value: **20 Energy**

fields.name: Rewards
fields.value: You find **1 random item**.

fields.name: Rarity Chances
fields.value: Explorer gets you a random Common(85%) or a Rare(15%) item.

fields.name: When to use
fields.value: Use Explorer when you want quick loot for collecting, quest, or low on energy.
